dev/lsf/util/date.hpp

00001 // File:        date.hpp
00002 // Description: ---
00003 // Notes:       ---
00004 // Author:      leoxiang <leoxiang727@qq.com>
00005 // Revision:    2012-06-04 by leoxiang
00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <ctime>
00010 #include <cstring>
00011 #include "lsf/basic/error.hpp"
00012 #include "lsf/basic/type_cast.hpp"
00013 #include "lsf/util/string_ext.hpp"
00014 
00015 namespace lsf {
00016 namespace util {
00017 
00018 class Date : public lsf::basic::Error {
00019 public:
00020     const static time_t SECONDS_PER_DAY = 3600 * 24;
00021     const static time_t SECONDS_PER_MONTH = 30 * SECONDS_PER_DAY;
00022 
00023 public:
00024     static Date Now() { return Date(); }
00025     static size_t DateTimeToInt(std::string const& date_time) {
00026         size_t pos = 0;
00027         size_t hour = lsf::basic::TypeCast<size_t>(lsf::util::StringExt::SplitGetNext(date_time, ':', pos, true));
00028         size_t minute = lsf::basic::TypeCast<size_t>(lsf::util::StringExt::SplitGetNext(date_time, ':', pos, true));
00029         size_t second = lsf::basic::TypeCast<size_t>(lsf::util::StringExt::SplitGetNext(date_time, ':', pos, true));
00030         return hour*3600 + minute*60 + second;
00031     }
00032     static bool IsSameDay(time_t time1, time_t time2) {
00033         Date d1(time1);
00034         Date d2(time2);
00035         return d1.GetYear() == d2.GetYear() &&
00036                d1.GetMonth() == d2.GetMonth() &&
00037                d1.GetDay() == d2.GetDay();
00038     }
00039 
00040 public:
00041     Date(time_t calendar_time = ::time(nullptr)) { ::localtime_r(&calendar_time, &_date); }
00042 
00043     Date(tm const& date) : _date(date) {}
00044 
00045     // must be this format "year-month-day hour:minute:second"
00046     Date(std::string const& date_string) {
00047         std::string tmp = date_string;
00048         util::StringExt::RemoveHeadWhitespace(tmp);
00049         util::StringExt::RemoveTailWhitespace(tmp);
00050         size_t pos = 0;
00051         size_t year   = basic::TypeCast<size_t>(util::StringExt::SplitGetNext(tmp, "- :", pos, true));
00052         size_t month  = basic::TypeCast<size_t>(util::StringExt::SplitGetNext(tmp, "- :", pos, true));
00053         size_t day    = basic::TypeCast<size_t>(util::StringExt::SplitGetNext(tmp, "- :", pos, true));
00054         size_t hour   = basic::TypeCast<size_t>(util::StringExt::SplitGetNext(tmp, "- :", pos, true));
00055         size_t minute = basic::TypeCast<size_t>(util::StringExt::SplitGetNext(tmp, "- :", pos, true));
00056         size_t second = basic::TypeCast<size_t>(util::StringExt::SplitGetNext(tmp, "- :", pos, true));
00057         new (this) Date(year, month, day, hour, minute, second);
00058     }
00059 
00060     Date(size_t year, size_t month, size_t day, size_t hour, size_t minute, size_t second) {
00061         Date();
00062         _date.tm_year = year - 1900;
00063         _date.tm_mon = month - 1;
00064         _date.tm_mday = day;
00065         _date.tm_hour = hour;
00066         _date.tm_min = minute;
00067         _date.tm_sec = second;
00068     }
00069 
00070     // member funcs
00071     void SetYear(size_t year) { _date.tm_year = year - 1900; }
00072     void SetMonth(size_t month) { _date.tm_mon = month - 1; }
00073     void SetDay(size_t day) { _date.tm_mday = day; }
00074     void SetHour(size_t hour) { _date.tm_hour = hour; }
00075     void SetMinute(size_t minute) { _date.tm_min = minute; }
00076     void SetSecond(size_t second) { _date.tm_sec = second; }
00077 
00078     size_t GetYear() const { return _date.tm_year + 1900; }
00079     size_t GetMonth() const { return _date.tm_mon + 1; }
00080     size_t GetDay() const { return _date.tm_mday; }
00081     size_t GetHour() const { return _date.tm_hour; }
00082     size_t GetMinute() const { return _date.tm_min; }
00083     size_t GetSecond() const { return _date.tm_sec; }
00084     size_t GetWeekDay() const { return _date.tm_wday; }
00085     size_t GetYearDay() const { return _date.tm_yday; }
00086 
00087     std::string ToFormatString(char const *fmt) const {
00088         char tmp[512];
00089         ::strftime(tmp, sizeof(tmp), fmt, &_date);
00090         return std::string(tmp);
00091     }
00092 
00093     std::string ToString() const { return ToFormatString("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"); }
00094 
00095     time_t ToCalendarTime() { return ::mktime(&_date); }
00096 
00097     size_t DateTimeToInt() { return GetHour()*3600 + GetMinute()*60 + GetSecond(); }
00098 
00099 private:
00100     struct tm _date;
00101 };
00102 
00103 }  // end of namespace util
00104 }  // end of namespace lsf
00105
